column4: Hi all, I recently updated my xorg and now ubuntu boots in safe graphics mode and i can't get it back to working like it was before.  any ideas?
Has anyone experienced a broken x server after the recent upgrade?
do you know how to reconfigure xorg in hardy?  i think dpkg-reconfigure command doesnt do what it should for x in hardy
thats usually the way, or xconfig
the dpkg command only asks about keyboard and mouse information
i think it is a known issue with hardy
so any other ideas on how to fix this?
working beautifully before the xorg upgrade
run xconfig-nvidia or something like that
doing that makes a new xorg but it still does nto work
i think i tried that, but i willt ry again
i shall return and let you know, thanks so far
